com.dreamtek.smartpos.deviceservice.aidl

Interface IRFCardReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IRFCardReader.Default, IRFCardReader.Stub

    public interface IRFCardReader
    the object of Contactless card, Mifare card, Memory card

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IRFCardReader.Default
      Default implementation for IRFCardReader.
      static class  IRFCardReader.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

    • Method Detail

      • searchCard

        void searchCard(RFSearchListener listener,
                int timeout)
         throws android.os.RemoteException
        search card
        Parameters:
        listener - the call back listener.
        timeout - timeout in second, should >= 1 sec
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
        See Also:
        RFSearchListener

      • stopSearch

        void stopSearch()
         throws android.os.RemoteException
        stop search
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • activate

        int activate(java.lang.String driver,
             byte[] responseData)
      throws android.os.RemoteException
        active the card
        Parameters:
        driver - the driver name
        • "S50" - S50(M1) card

        • "S70" - S70(M1) card

        • "CPU" - CUP card

        • "PRO" - PRO、S5O_PRO、S70_PRO

        responseData - - the response data from the card
        Returns:
        0 for success, others means failure
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

        void halt()
   throws android.os.RemoteException
        same as stopSearch
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • isExist

        boolean isExist()
         throws android.os.RemoteException
        check the card is present
        Returns:
        true while the card is exist, false while the card is not present
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • authBlock

        int authBlock(int blockNo,
              int keyType,
              byte[] key)
       throws android.os.RemoteException
        author the block (with given block No.)
        Parameters:
        blockNo - the block No.(index) start at 0
        keyType - the key type, KEY_A(0) or KEY_B(1)
        key - the key, length: 6
        Returns:
        0 means success, others while failure
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • authSector

        int authSector(int sectorNo,
               int keyType,
               byte[] key)
        throws android.os.RemoteException
        author the sector ( with given sector No.)
        Parameters:
        sectorNo - the sector No.(index) start at 0.
        keyType - the key type KEY_A(0) or KEY_B(1)
        key - the key, length: 6
        Returns:
        0 means success, others while failure
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • readBlock

        int readBlock(int blockNo,
              byte[] data)
       throws android.os.RemoteException
        read a block
        Parameters:
        blockNo - the block No.
        data - the data from the block, length: 16
        Returns:
        0 means success, others while failure
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • writeBlock

        int writeBlock(int blockNo,
               byte[] data)
        throws android.os.RemoteException
        write a block The length MUST be 16, others will cause error
        Parameters:
        blockNo - the block No.
        data - the source data
        Returns:
        0 means success, others while failure
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getCardInfo

        android.os.Bundle getCardInfo()
                       throws android.os.RemoteException
        get card info in RFSearchListener.onCardPass callback
        Returns:
        bundle of cardInfo
        • sn(ByteArray)
        • ATQA(ByteArray) support A/B card and S50 & S70 for now
        • SAK(ByteArray) support A/B card and S50 & S70 for now
        • cardInfo(String) all the above card's informations
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • restore

        byte restore(byte blockNo)
      throws android.os.RemoteException
        restore blockNo
        Parameters:
        blockNo - the block No.
        Returns:
        result 0x00-sucess; 0x01-blockNo error; 0x02-operate failed; 0xff-other error
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • forceMifareProcess

        void forceMifareProcess(boolean forceMifare)
                 throws android.os.RemoteException
        force Mifare process when using Mifare Plus(ISO/IEC 14443 and ISO 7816-4) card
        Parameters:
        forceMifare: - false(default) - choose ISO/IEC 14443; true - choose ISO 7816-4;
        Throws:
        RemoteException
